trans-unit.source: Set the view you want to display
trans-unit.target: Set the view you want to display

trans-unit.source: List view shows all address records. Latest uses a time restriction, the rest should be understandable
trans-unit.target: List view shows all address records. Latest uses a time restriction, the rest should be understandable

trans-unit.source: Define the sorting field
trans-unit.target: Define the sorting field

trans-unit.source: Define the sorting direction
trans-unit.target: Define the sorting direction

trans-unit.source: Select the field which is used to build the date menu.
trans-unit.target: Select the field which is used to build the date menu.

trans-unit.source: Choose the categories to define which address items are displayed
trans-unit.target: Choose the categories to define which address items are displayed

trans-unit.source: Define how the selected categories are used
trans-unit.target: Define how the selected categories are used

trans-unit.source: Include all subcategories of the selected categories too.
trans-unit.target: Include all subcategories of the selected categories too.

trans-unit.source: "Don't care": No category restriction is set. "Show items with selected categories OR": A address records need to be related with at least one of the selected categories. "Show selected categories AND". A address record need to be related to all selected categories. "Do not show" is the opposite of above.
trans-unit.target: "Don't care": No category restriction is set. "Show items with selected categories OR": A address records need to be related with at least one of the selected categories. "Show selected categories AND". A address record need to be related to all selected categories. "Do not show" is the opposite of above.

trans-unit.source: Choose between: 1) Show all address records, 2) Show only active address records, 3) Show only archived address records. The archive date is defined in each address record. If no archive date is set, the address record can't be archived.
trans-unit.target: Choose between: 1) Show all address records, 2) Show only active address records, 3) Show only archived address records. The archive date is defined in each address record. If no archive date is set, the address record can't be archived.

trans-unit.source: Set a time limit. This can either be an integer and means seconds, e.g. 86400 means 1 day(60 * 60 * 24) or a string like "-4 days" or "-3 hours". The prepended - is important! Only address items after the given time are shown.
trans-unit.target: Set a time limit. This can either be an integer and means seconds, e.g. 86400 means 1 day(60 * 60 * 24) or a string like "-4 days" or "-3 hours". The prepended - is important! Only address items after the given time are shown.

trans-unit.source: Set a time limit. This can either be an integer and means seconds, e.g. 86400 means 1 day(60 * 60 * 24) or a string like "-4 days" or "-3 hours". The prepended - is important! Only address items before the given time are shown.
trans-unit.target: Set a time limit. This can either be an integer and means seconds, e.g. 86400 means 1 day(60 * 60 * 24) or a string like "-4 days" or "-3 hours". The prepended - is important! Only address items before the given time are shown.

trans-unit.source: A address record can be set as top address. Therefore it can be defined to show either all address records, only top address or only nontop address.
trans-unit.target: A address record can be set as top address. Therefore it can be defined to show either all address records, only top address or only nontop address.

trans-unit.source: Display the selected single address record.
trans-unit.target: Display the selected single address record.

trans-unit.source: If set, hidden records are also displayed. This is needed if you want to preview still hidden records. Be aware that any hidden records on the current page are shown as well.
trans-unit.target: If set, hidden records are also displayed. This is needed if you want to preview still hidden records. Be aware that any hidden records on the current page are shown as well.

trans-unit.source: Define the pages/sysfolders which hold the address records
trans-unit.target: Define the pages/sysfolders which hold the address records

trans-unit.source: Select the recursion level of the startingpoint.
trans-unit.target: Select the recursion level of the startingpoint.

trans-unit.source: Select the page on which the detail view should be shown.
trans-unit.target: Select the page on which the detail view should be shown.

trans-unit.source: Select the page which is used to return to on detail view.
trans-unit.target: Select the page which is used to return to on detail view.

trans-unit.source: Select the page on which the list view is shown.
trans-unit.target: Select the page on which the list view is shown.

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum amount of address records to be displayed
trans-unit.target: Set the maximum amount of address records to be displayed

trans-unit.source: Set the offset to start with. E.g. 3 means that the first 2 records are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Set the offset to start with. E.g. 3 means that the first 2 records are not rendered.

trans-unit.source: If checked: No matter which sorting is defined, top address are shown as first address records.
trans-unit.target: If checked: No matter which sorting is defined, top address are shown as first address records.

trans-unit.source: If checked, this plugin won't be influenced through the override demand settings which can be e.g. a category via URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: If checked, this plugin won't be influenced through the override demand settings which can be e.g. a category via URL parameter.

trans-unit.source: Filter by given tags.
trans-unit.target: Filter by given tags.

trans-unit.source: Maximal width of media elements (images, videos, ...)
trans-unit.target: Maximal width of media elements (images, videos, ...)

trans-unit.source: Maximal height of media elements (images, videos, ...)
trans-unit.target: Maximal height of media elements (images, videos, ...)

trans-unit.source: Define the length of the teaser in chars. The teaser is typically cropped in the list view.
trans-unit.target: Define the length of the teaser in chars. The teaser is typically cropped in the list view.

trans-unit.source: Select a special layout for displaying address records.
trans-unit.target: Select a special layout for displaying address records.
